entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 04:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
